revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Brooklet Hill |image = [[File:Brooklet Hill.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Brooklet Hill. |tokens = 875,000 |location = West of Route 5 }}
'''Brooklet Hill''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, The [[Gyms#Alola|Waterium-Z]][[File:WateriumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 12,128,060 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
